timeline.bodyText:
Isn't
[INFO] Including org.reactivestreams:reactive-streams:jar:1.0.2 in the shaded jar.

missing from this file?
(my mvn output is from 1.11 and a few days old 🤦 )

timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText:
I have
[INFO] Including org.lz4:lz4-java:jar:1.5.0 in the shaded jar.

in my output, but this file lists version 1.6.0. Is this a 1.11 vs 1.12 issue?
replies.author: rmetzger

replies.bodyText: lz4-java was bumped in 889705c and is available in both master and release-1.11 . Was your branch possibly outdated?
replies.author: zentol

replies.bodyText: reactive-streams  is at the very bottom ;)
replies.author: zentol

replies.bodyText: Ah, I didn't know that you have to click this "expand" button multiple times. My bad.
replies.author: rmetzger

replies.bodyText:
lz4-java was bumped in 889705c and is available in both master and release-1.11 . Was your branch possibly outdated?

Yes, I was outdated
replies.author: rmetzger
